title: Verify: Implement Rate Limiting and CORS Security
description:
Run automated tests for task T-067.
Review changes and verify acceptance criteria.
Original: Add rate limiting to all endpoints (configurable per-user) and ensure CORS is properly configured per environment.
Criteria:
- Rate limiting enforced on all endpoints
- CORS configuration matches environment
- No CORS or rate limit bypasses
acceptance_criteria: Rate limiting enforced on all endpoints
No CORS or rate limit bypasses
